member.name: M:ErgastAPP.Models.DataErgast.RemoveMRData(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the first value. Every response has a root element "MRData" and then a package with this format. We remove this element in order to be able to parse every response.
member.param: Raw string with the all response.
member.returns: The raw string response without the MRData as root node.
